item.title: Bureau of Public Education
item.description: This bureau is part of the Education Parliament The Bureau of Public Education oversees all compulsory education across the Commonwealth, including both government and vocational schools. Vekllei Primary Education Directorate # Vekllei Higher Education Directorate # All-Commonwealth School Directorate # The All-Commonwealth School Directorate (ACC) manages the local production of school materials, particularly uniforms and textbooks, and ensures their availability and quality for students. The ACC is not involved in teaching or study itself, and instead serves learning infrastructure, including the maintenance and renewal of existing school buildings.
item.content:encoded:
This bureau is part of the Education Parliament

The Bureau of Public Education oversees all compulsory education across the Commonwealth, including both government and vocational schools.

Vekllei Primary Education Directorate #

Vekllei Higher Education Directorate #

All-Commonwealth School Directorate #

The All-Commonwealth School Directorate (ACC) manages the local production of school materials, particularly uniforms and textbooks, and ensures their availability and quality for students. The ACC is not involved in teaching or study itself, and instead serves learning infrastructure, including the maintenance and renewal of existing school buildings.

Common Children’s Press #

Common Tertiary Press #

item.title: Commonwealth Laboratories
item.description: National Labs are part of the Education Parliament and SIRO Commonwealth Laboratories (also National Labs) is the primary government research complex in Vekllei. It operates out of two main campuses complexes in Oslola and Kairi, and has auxiliary campuses in the Bahamas, Verde, and Sude Republic. It is a part of SIRO.
item.content:encoded:
National Labs are part of the Education Parliament and SIRO

Commonwealth Laboratories (also National Labs) is the primary government research complex in Vekllei. It operates out of two main campuses complexes in Oslola and Kairi, and has auxiliary campuses in the Bahamas, Verde, and Sude Republic. It is a part of SIRO.
